alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Geneva (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:48PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Coffee and western Geneva Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 348 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Samson, or 10 miles northwest of Geneva, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Samson, Coffee Springs, Chancellor, Spears, Pera, Weeks, Sellersville, Lytle, Lucile, Highfalls, Marl, Central City, Logan Field Municipal A/P, Battens Crossroads, Goodman, Enterprise Municipal A/P, Lowery and Marvin Chapel. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
